comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Gustave Léon Niox French general. At time of WWI, he was Governor of Les Invalides, military museum in Paris, housing tomb of Napoleon Bonaparte among others. military-photos.com/niox.htm He wrote several books, including The Hôtel des invalides (this is a translation) www.archive.org/details/hoteldesinvalids00niox
